name: SAP-Certified Infrastructure
description: Run your SAP landscapes on the most powerful SAP-certified servers in the cloud. Choose from a wide range of SAP-certified configurations that allows you to run your entire SAP landscape while meeting your data soverenty, security and resiliency needs with our global network of datacenters

name: Fast on-ramp to building Cloud-Native apps
description: A guided, curated developer experience for developers to start, get productive, and collaborate. IBM Cloud App Service Starter-Kits integrate Open Source language frameworks, runtimes, DevOps, cloud services, and compute (CF or Kubernetes), collapses barriers to entry to IBM Cloud

name: VMware Workloads
description: Easily deploy VMware workloads to the cloud for a seamless hybrid cloud experience. Expanding list of ecosystem partners to provide simplified  networking, storage, and security solutions including: Veeam, Zerto, F5, Fortinet, NetApp, and more to come.

name: Mass Data Migration Service (MDMS)
description: A fast, simple way to transport data into the IBM Cloud. Move terabytes to petabytes of data securely using rugged, 120TB capacity storage devices. Mass Data Migration helps overcome data transfer challenges such as high network costs, long transfer times, and security concerns.

name: Virtual Server Instances (VSI) capabilities
description: Run intensive workloads at accelerated compute capacity. High performance computing for graphically and data intensive applications with rapid execution. P100 support for machine learning/deep learning workloads as well as big data.

name: Bluemix is now IBM Cloud
description: Our goal is to provide a cloud that is easy to use, unified across multiple deployments and the world leader in supporting mission critical workloads. As part of our ongoing work to build the cloud designed for you, we are unifying the public, private, hybrid and multi-cloud under one brand. IBM Cloud

name: New Networking Capabilities
description: Maximum security and flexibility with easy administration.Protect your Virtual Servers  with IBM Cloud Network Security Groups (Virtual Firewalls).Access content faster around the world with our Content Delivery Network  (CDN) powered by Akamai.

name: IBM Cloud Private
description: Drive transformation with the security and control of an untethered environment with IBM Cloud Private. This is an enterprise grade private cloud platform behind your firewall for app development. Untethered, unmanaged environment that gives you complete control on VMware and Openstack

name: Expanded Partnership with Docker
description: Easily modernize existing applications with Docker Enterprise Edition. Docker Enterprise Edition (EE) for IBM Cloud, which will allow customers to easily bring up a Docker environment to containerize their existing workloads and run them on IBM Cloud

name: Watson Conversation
description: Conversation with Watson Recommends, Lifecycle Management and Relevancy Training

name: Watson Discovery
description: Query chaining/workflows (Beta)

name: Watson Compare & Comply
description: Natural Language Processing, Text-Native PDF, Experimental Release Validation

name: Watson Speech Services
description: Core Enhancements, improved language models, Speech tooling and data collection

name: Watson Virtual Agent
description: Migrate to Kubernetes

name: Watson Virtual Agent
description: Agent Escalation within Dialog, Pre-Trained Intents in Dialog, Chat Log Analysis and Mapping, Agent Assistance + Implicit Learning ,Pre-Trained Intent Augmentation

name: IBM Analytics Engine GA
description: Single engine for Spark and Hadoop workloads

name: IBM Data Catalog Open Beta
description: Govrn, integrated assets across WDP experiences

name: IBM Watson Data Platform
description: Integrated Experience for IBM Watson Data Platform

name: Streaming Analytics
description: IWeb based pipeline development, new Entry plan.

name: Containers
description: Container GA in Washington DC, Melbourne, Toronto, Paris, Tokyo, Hong Hong, Sao Paolo and Singapore

name: Kubernetes Containers
description: Containers Kubernetes conformance certification

name: Containers Security
description: Containers security with edge node support

name: Block storage for containers
description: Block storage for containers; Front Door with hardened controller; Registry with Helm chart support

name: Logging & Monitoring
description: Logging & Monitoring in Frankfurt, Sydney and London

name: Activity Tracker
description: Activity Tracker Goes Live

name: Resource Groups
description: Improved cloud resource management with Resource Groups
